lead_paragraph: When Novak Djokovic walks back out on the grass at Wimbledon on Saturday, he'll have plenty of work to do.
snippet: When Novak Djokovic walks back out on the grass at Wimbledon on Saturday, he'll have plenty of work to do....

headline.main: Trailing by 2 Sets, Djokovic Back on Court at Wimbledon
headline.print_headline: Trailing by 2 Sets, Djokovic Back on Court at Wimbledon
